title: Sealed message from the Queen
contents:
subtitle | Head towards Stilben for resupply at the guild house.
Search Summit Peaks regardless whether you got any intel from Mooren Lake.

title: Message for Kate Irwin
contents:
subtitle | Dear Kate,
These adventures are trustworthy, please help if you can.
text | 2 lizard tails, eye ball from the bat, 1 coffee bean and pixie dust at Deliscour Lake.
